skins.shipDescription: Benson class Destroyer― Kalk, hull number DD-611.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Benson class Destroyer, Kalk, hull number DD611. I run many errands for the Eagle Union, and I’ve been to many places as such. Although, I don’t really like all this running around… (whispers)
skins.acquisition: Kalk, reporting in (flick sleeves) Commander, will you give me a high-five. As long as we high-five, we’re friends.
skins.login: Commander Commander, while you were away I secretly drizzled hot sauce on everyone’s food. But how come only my food is especially spicy... oh no... don’t knock me on the head...
skins.details: You need to give me good equipments~ This way, those mean aircrafts won’t hurt me anymore.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Compared to running errands, it’s definitely better to stick together with Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hehe, I am full of luck as long as the Commander holds my hand~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you want me to put insects in your bed?
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? Are you praising me for switching everyone’s breakfast into homemade Italian spicy-sauce noodles~ Thank you Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...Does this make you happy, Commander? (Tilts head)

skins.shipDescription: Kalk, reporting in once again, now with a new outfit! Hehe... Commander, will you walk me to school?
skins.acquisition: Kalk, reporting in once again, now with a new outfit! Hehe... Commander, will you walk me to school?
skins.login: Commander, I've been waiting for you! Uuu.... just look, I've been standing here for so long that my cannon and torpedoes have turned into ice pops~
skins.details: Cute little bunny~ Hehe, Commander, I like to hang out with cute little animals.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's snowing pretty hard outside. Commander, want a nice warm cup of cider before you head out?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hobby is so cute, isn't she? I'd love to be as outgoing as her.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's really cold outside, Commander, so you should take care to stay warm. Here, I poured your cider into hot sauce so it will keep you warm better~
skins.secretaryTouch: Want to come with me? Mhm, let's head to school together then!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander? So you're also a prankster...
